mapper.select: SELECT tb.strNo , tb.strName , CONCAT(tb.strAddr,' ',tb.strDt) AS totalAddr , ui.name , ui.email , CONCAT(ui.hp1,'-',ui.hp2,'-',ui.hp3) AS totalHp FROM tb_storage tb LEFT JOIN tb_userinfo ui ON tb.loginID = ui.loginID LIMIT #{pageIndex}, #{pageSize};

SELECT tb.strName , CONCAT(tb.strAddr,' ',tb.strDt) AS 창고주소 , ui.loginID 로그인아이디 , ui.name 담당자성함 , ui.email 이메일주소 , CONCAT(ui.hp1,'-',ui.hp2,'-',ui.hp3) AS 연락처 FROM tb_storage tb LEFT JOIN tb_userinfo ui ON tb.loginID = ui.loginID;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_storage ( strNo, strName, strPcode, strAddr, strDt, loginID, strMnm ) VALUES ( #{strNo}, #{strName}, #{strPcode}, #{strAddr}, #{strDt}, #{loginID}, #{strMnm} );
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_storage st SET st.strName = #{strName}, st.strPcode = CONCAT(tb.strAddr,' ',tb.strDt) st.strAddr = #{strAddr}, st.strDt = #{strDt}, st.loginID = (SELECT loginID FROM tb_userinfo WHERE loginID=#{loginID}) WHERE strNo = #{strNo};
